banner: ALL GIFTS DOUBLED: Our investigative reporting cannot continue without you »
featured-promo-image-description: Support Spotlight PA's nonpartisan journalism and your gift will be DOUBLED.
sticky-image-description: Support Spotlight PA's independent, unbiased reporting for Pennsylvania and today, your gift will be DOUBLED.
support-hed: Before you go, I have an urgent request...
support-text: We grant elected officials extraordinary power when we give them our vote, which means we must demand extraordinary accountability once they are in office. That's why Spotlight PA's trustworthy, unbiased local news is more important than ever, and why we need you now. For #GivingTuesday, your support will be TRIPLED. We're independent, and we don't answer to shareholders or a big corporation. We're neutral in this polarized time, with no political agenda or opinion pieces. And we're a nonprofit, allowing us to prioritize fact-based investigative and public-service reporting for our community. Uncertain times call for decisive action, and thousands of readers just like you — friends and neighbors who still give a damn about truth, accountability, and transparency — are getting behind Spotlight PA. Join them now and for a very limited time, all gifts will be TRIPLED. — Christopher Baxter, CEO/President PS: If you prefer to mail a check, you can send it to: Spotlight PA, PO Box 11728, Harrisburg, PA 17108-1728
takeover-dek: We need to raise $15K for #GivingTuesday, and all gifts will be TRIPLED in support of Spotlight PA's unbiased reporting  »
